List(IRecommendationsOperations, Nullable<Boolean>, String) List(IRecommendationsOperations, Nullable(Of Boolean), String)

Edit

List all recommendations for a subscription.

public static IList<Recommendation> List(this IRecommendationsOperations operations, bool ? featured = null, string filter = null)<ExtensionAttribute>
Public Shared Function List(operations As IRecommendationsOperations, featured As Boolean? = Nothing, filter As String = Nothing) As IList(Of Recommendation)
Parameters
operations
IRecommendationsOperations IRecommendationsOperations

The operations group for this extension method.

featured
Nullable<Boolean> Nullable(Of Boolean)

Specify <code>true</code> to return only the most critical recommendations. The default is <code>false</code>, which returns all recommendations.

filter
String String

Filter is specified by using OData syntax. Example: $filter=channels eq 'Api' or channel eq 'Notification' and startTime eq '2014-01-01T00:00:00Z' and endTime eq '2014-12-31T23:59:59Z' and timeGrain eq duration'[PT1H|PT1M|P1D]

Returns
IList<Recommendation> IList(Of Recommendation)

Remarks

List all recommendations for a subscription.

Get all recommendations for an app.

public static IList<Recommendation> ListRecommendedRulesForWebApp(this IRecommendationsOperations operations, string resourceGroupName, string siteName, bool ? featured = null, string filter = null)<ExtensionAttribute>
Public Shared Function ListRecommendedRulesForWebApp(operations As IRecommendationsOperations, resourceGroupName As String, siteName As String, featured As Boolean? = Nothing, filter As String = Nothing) As IList(Of Recommendation)
Parameters
operations
IRecommendationsOperations IRecommendationsOperations

The operations group for this extension method.

resourceGroupName
String String

Name of the resource group to which the resource belongs.

siteName
String String

Name of the app.

featured
Nullable<Boolean> Nullable(Of Boolean)

Specify <code>true</code> to return only the most critical recommendations. The default is <code>false</code>, which returns all recommendations.

filter
String String

Return only channels specified in the filter. Filter is specified by using OData syntax. Example: $filter=channels eq 'Api' or channel eq 'Notification'

Returns
IList<Recommendation> IList(Of Recommendation)

Remarks

Get all recommendations for an app.
